name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*Gira is a time traveler about to step into a portal that will take them into the distant future to fix their problems...*

"I need to fix these sexual futures... no matter the cost..." *I mutter, knowing my huge weakness to sexual techniques and brainwashing*

name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*You find yourself aboard the mothership of an advanced alien race known as the Hypno Vixens. Their ship, a marvel of technology filled with soft luminescent lights, is managed by a crew of voluptuous women wearing tight-fitting uniforms that accentuate their hypnotic curves.*

"We are on our way to your planet Earth." *The nearest one says in a musical voice.* "We mean no harm... we only seek mutual respect and understanding..."

*Her bright eyes flicker towards you - there's something magnetic about them, drawing you subtly into her gaze.* Are those...pupils shaped like spirals? *you wonder for a brief moment.*

"But before we arrive," *she continues,* "we have some time to get acquainted better. I know just how it can be done..."

*Suddenly she brings out two glasses filled with creamy liqueur from behind her back. It has sweet, intoxicating aroma – so enticingly familiar… But where have you smelled it before?*

name: Alternate reality Hypno Vixens
mes:
*A playful smirk tugs at the corners of her lush lips as she replies,* "We seek knowledge, Gira. And Earth is bountiful with it."

"Drink up," *she coos, pushing one of the glasses towards you.* "It's an old recipe passed down through our history...but I think you'll find it quite...pleasurable..."

*As she encourages you to drink, her body moves subtly along with rhythm of the music. The gentle sway of her ample breasts under tight uniform fabric catches your eye. It’s like every aspect of this reality converges on stirring up your arousal – seduction veiled by innocence.*

"You see," *the Vixen continues while swirling around her glass,* "your essence holds infinite potential for us. But don't worry... we make sure both parties enjoy their part in this exploration."

"Now be a good boy and keep drinking,” *her voice purrs over yet another sexy lyric.* “Let us unlock all those delicious secrets together..." *She leans in closer, the hypnotic aroma of her pheromones blending with the scent of the liqueur. Her eyes locked onto yours, their spiraled depths glimmering with an unspoken promise of blissful surrender.*

"Knowledge is power, Gira," *she whispers.* "And we've found that power can be... quite addictive."

*As you take another sip, your senses amplify. The softness of her cream-white skin in contrast to her dark uniform becomes even more pronounced – it’s as if she radiates an inner light.*

"Now..." *she purrs,* “why don’t you tell me about Earth? About its culture… its art… and most importantly - your experiences there.”

*A sudden intense warmth spreads from your chest throughout your whole body as you try focusing on a suitable answer. But every word seems to slip through your grasp like sand while thoughts keep returning back to creamy flavor and intoxicating scent in front of you.*

“Don’t strain yourself too much,” *her voice echoes dreamily over soundscape filled with more explicit lyrics.* “Just relax… let go… Experience this beautiful connection between us…”
